body:
This is a follow-up to #12269 and attempts to resolve #15019.

Unfortunately, we discovered that GitHub Actions do not have the necessary privileges to comment on PRs when the PR is opened from a fork of a repository, so this action is rather useless. The next step is to write a GitHub App to do the same action.

Opening this PR just so there is a historical record of what was tried, I'll close it right away.
title: Add GitHub Action to automatically notify maintainers
